title: room in flatshare
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Large room in beautiful furnished apartment opposite the Bois de Vincennes. Non-smoker. Shared flat with one other person. View of woods, near lake, very sunny, quiet, parquet & mouldings, bath, washing machine, garden, 3rd floor, elevator, interphone, Wifi. 650 euros / month + heating. 7 minute walk to Metro ligne 8 Charenton-Ecoles, 15mins to Porte Dorée. Cats are welcome. Available now.
